edu.hm.cs.bikebattle.app.activities

Class TrackingViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.hm.cs.bikebattle.app.activities.TrackingViewController

  • public class TrackingViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for tracking activity. Controls the views and updates track information.
